thread.title: ‘No help’ from police for murder witness in hiding
thread.title_full: ‘No help’ from police for murder witness in hiding | News24

author: news24.com
title: ‘No help’ from police for murder witness in hiding
text:
Pietermaritzburg - Zwakushiwo Mkhize, 40, from Nkandla has been hiding out in Pietermaritzburg in fear for his life since last November.
His fear stems from the fact that he had information regarding a firearm that was used to commit a murder, and also gave police information leading to the arrest of the alleged killer.
Mkhize has been trying to get a police protection as he became a target after helping the police but has not yet received any help.
He told The Witness he was shot at a “couple of times” two weeks after he gave police information about the murder, which took place in March 2013 at King Edward VIII hospital.
